definitions.text: the chair of state for a monarch, bishop, etc.
examples: the king sat on his throne

definitions.text: a plumbing fixture for defecation and urination
the position and power of an exalted person (a sovereign or bishop) who is entitled to sit in a chair of state on ceremonial occasions
sit on the throne as a ruler
put a monarch on the throne
examples: The Queen was enthroned more than 50 years ago
